publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1254# Jackie Baillie: Support for Microcredit-That the Parliament recognises the valuable role of microcredit programmes across the world in helping to lift people out of poverty through social and economic development; notes that microcredit is particularly useful in empowering women through affordable credit, savings and support for self-employment; further notes the achievements of the Wellpark Enterprise Centre, Glasgow, in providing information, advice, training and counselling for women in business and in acting as a gateway to microcredit initiatives in Scotland; recognises the importance of Scottish Enterprise's National Microcredit Programme, and considers that the Scottish Executive should further promote the development of microcredit initiatives in Scotland leading up to the UN International Year of Microcredit in 2005.
S2M-1254# Support for Microcredit (lodged on 4 May 2004) Sarah Boyack*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mike Watson*, Pauline McNeill*, Paul Martin*, Scott Barrie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Johann Lamont*
S2M-1254# Support for Microcredit (lodged on 4 May 2004) Susan Deacon*, Donald Gorrie*, Marlyn Glen*
